title: Real webhook test - Clide should analyze this!
body:
ðŸŽ¯ **Real Webhook Test**

This issue is being created to test the complete end-to-end webhook flow:

## What Should Happen
1. GitHub sends webhook to `https://clidecoder.com/webhook`
2. Nginx routes to our HLS service on port 8000
3. Clide analyzes this issue and provides recommendations
4. Response should include Clide's friendly analysis

## Issue Details
- **Type**: Bug report
- **Priority**: High
- **Component**: Webhook processing

## Expected Clide Analysis
Clide should identify this as a test issue and provide appropriate categorization.

---
*This is the REAL test of our webhook integration! ðŸš€*
